amendment.description: An amendment numbered 99 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding to implement the proposed "Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Endangered Species Status for Texas Kangaroo Rat and Designation of Critical Habitat rule by the Fish and Wildlife Service.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson (TX) amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
